subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Hakeem Olajuwon, a two-time N.B.A. champion and a leading teacher of low-post moves, will visit the Knicks’ training facility next week to give lessons to the team’s big men.
snippet: Hakeem Olajuwon, a two-time N.B.A. champion and a leading teacher of low-post moves, will visit the Knicks’ training facility next week to give lessons to the team’s big men.
